paramInformation.label: Dim Step Level
paramInformation.description: Defines the number of steps necessary to reach full brightness.

metadata.inclusion:
1. Turn off power to the light bulb socket
2. Screw in the light bulb
3. Turn on power to the light bulb
4. If successful, the LED light bulb will flash twice
metadata.exclusion: Turn off power to the light bulb socket, then turn on power to the light bulb. If successful, the LED light bulb will flash twice.
metadata.reset: Flick the wall switch 'OFF-ON' 4 times within 4 seconds. The light bulb will flash twice after reset is successful.
